module.overview: This module focuses on building practical applications using Python APIs and React, combining backend API integration with frontend development. Students will learn to create full-stack applications through hands-on projects and peer collaboration.

objectives.objective: Understand and implement RESTful API concepts using Python
Create and consume APIs using Python frameworks like Flask or FastAPI
Build basic React components that interact with Python APIs
Implement proper error handling and API security best practices
Design and document APIs following industry standards

projects.project: Weather Dashboard\n Create a React frontend that displays weather data fetched from a Python API wrapper around a public weather service. Implement caching and error handling.
Task Management API\n Build a RESTful API using Python to manage tasks and todos, with a React frontend for user interaction. Include authentication and data persistence.
API Gateway Service\n Develop a Python-based API gateway that aggregates multiple external APIs and serves data to a React dashboard.

module.notes:
- Encourage pair programming for API development and testing
 - Use real-world API examples to demonstrate concepts
 - Focus on iterative development with frequent peer review
 - Include API documentation as a key deliverable
 - Emphasize error handling and edge cases
 - Structure projects to build progressively on concepts
